content:
Sure, here's a short song in the style of Green Day that conveys the main tenets of the policy:

(Verse 1)
Virtual services, we're here to say,
Remote doesn't mean we're far away.
Zoom, Meet, Teams, we've got it all,
To make sure you don't miss a call.

(Chorus)
Accessibility, we'll make it work,
'Cause we know that's what you deserve.
Customer service is number one,
That's how the job gets done.

(Verse 2)
CalJOBS and signatures, it's all online,
Don't worry, we'll show you how to sign.
Youth and career services, workshops too,
We'll help you find what's right for you.

(Chorus)
Accessibility, we'll make it work,
'Cause we know that's what you deserve.
Customer service is number one,
That's how the job gets done.

(Bridge)
Evaluation is key, we'll keep it tight,
To make sure our services are just right.
Telephone support is here for you,
But we know remote is the way to do.

(Chorus)
Accessibility, we'll make it work,
'Cause we know that's what you deserve.
Customer service is number one,
That's how the job gets done.
